ComicInfo.Summary: A new story arc begins with Helen's arrival before the walls of Troy. Paris proudly displays her to his father, King Priam, and the rest of the royal family. But a controversy quickly builds over whether to send Helen home or not. Tension runs high as Helen argues for a place in her new life. Meanwhile, Aeneas and Troilus are having troubles with their own love-lives.
